entry.title: Life on the Other Side
entry.summary:
Author: Akio_O

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,617Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 295

Summary: For Timothy Drake, obsession is far worse than compulsion.Compulsivity is action. Action can be taken and completed at any time, it‚Äôs mindless. It‚Äôs repetitive movement, expected and anticipated more often than not.Obsession is far worse. Obsession plagues the mind and overtakes rationality. It spins spiderwebs in the brain and warps your very being. It can spawn from the simplest thing and then spiral into an all encompassing essentiality.TLDR; Tim needs to know everything, Damian is hard to know and the world makes it impossible. Plus a stroll on the darker side of Gotham!
